Uses of Package
co.cask.coopr.spec.template

Packages that use co.cask.coopr.spec.template
co.cask.coopr.cluster Cluster and Node objects. 
co.cask.coopr.codec.json.current Codecs for serializing and deserializing current versions of objects to and from json. 
co.cask.coopr.layout Classes related to solving cluster layouts. 
co.cask.coopr.spec.template Specifications for cluster templates. 
co.cask.coopr.store.entity Persistent store for admin definable entities. 
 

Classes in co.cask.coopr.spec.template used by co.cask.coopr.cluster
ClusterTemplate
          A cluster template defines different types of clusters that will be available for users to create.
 

Classes in co.cask.coopr.spec.template used by co.cask.coopr.codec.json.current
Administration
          Defines settings for cluster administration like lease duration, etc.
ClusterDefaults
          Default values for a cluster.
ClusterTemplate
          A cluster template defines different types of clusters that will be available for users to create.
Compatibilities
          Defines hardwaretypes, imagetypes, and services that a cluster is compatible with.
Constraints
          Constraints for how a cluster can be laid out.
LayoutConstraint
          A Layout constraint specifies sets of services that must coexist on the same node, and sets of services that must not coexist on the same node in a cluster.
LeaseDuration
          Defines lease duration for a cluster.
ServiceConstraint
          Service constraints restrict what hardware and images are allowed for some service.
SizeConstraint
          A size constraint on the cluster, enforcing some min and/or max on the number of nodes in the cluster.
 

Classes in co.cask.coopr.spec.template used by co.cask.coopr.layout
ClusterTemplate
          A cluster template defines different types of clusters that will be available for users to create.
Constraints
          Constraints for how a cluster can be laid out.
ServiceConstraint
          Service constraints restrict what hardware and images are allowed for some service.
